structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Application of KRS 77.280 to 77.305 to certain hearings.
law.text: KRS 77.280 to 77.305 applies to all hearings which KRS 77.180 to 77.275 provide shall be held by the hearing board.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 71, effective March 14, 1952.
